items.summary: Update splash screen styling (in `frontend/src/index.css` and/or Tailwind classes in `frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx`) to integrate the galaxy image background behind the name area while keeping existing splash layout, fade-out behavior, and Skip button behavior unchanged.
Update the splash/intro screen company name text in `frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx` to display exactly: "GALAXY INTERNET" (replace the current "Star Maharashtra Galaxy Internet" text).

Add a galaxy-themed background image behind the splash screen company name area (the text block containing the "GALAXY INTERNET" headline), using a static frontend asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, and style it so the headline remains readable with sufficient contrast across breakpoints.
